name: 3D Brick Buster Free
description:
Welcome back to the classic paddle-battle game!

Destroy the all the bricks to advance to the next level. Use your 'launch pad' to hit the ball. Catch falling bonus pieces to gain different powers. Beware! Enemy robot toys float around the board and make the game more difficult.

Catch the falling objects with your paddle to active special power-ups. Remember, not every falling piece is good to get!

Total retro arcade action! The FREE version of 3D Brick Buster contains 10 full levels to play.

Features

* 10 amazing levels
* Awesome power-ups
* High-score table
* Super addicting game-play
* Cool soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
